moves.1. d4: Here is a decent game i played with the white pieces against shyon4944. i decided to go with queens gambit.
moves.1... c5: he played the Sicilian even after e4?!?
moves.2. dxc5 Qa5+: well he gets his pawn back, but queen will get chased.
moves.5... Qd8: White is ahead in development by quite alot.
moves.6. Ne4: i just though to centralize my knight.
moves.6... h6 7. O-O-O e6 8. Qb3 Nc6 9. Nf3 a6: i decided to fianchetto my lsb.
moves.10... Nf6 11. Nxf6+: my knight on e4 was hanging so thought its better to take
moves.11... Qxf6 12. Bg2 Nb4 13. a3: that knight was a real nuisance so had to kick it back.
moves.13... Nd5 14. Bd4 Qd8: queen back on the home square for the third time.
moves.16... exd5 17. Qf3: though ill keep the pressure going with a quick matey thread.
moves.19... Qf6 20. Ng6+: thats a naty discovert check and an attack against the queen.
moves.21... gxf6 22. Qxf6+: the game is all over for black at this point
moves.22... Kc8 23. Re8+ Kc7 24. Rxa8: always good to exchange pieces when up in material.
moves.24... Bxa8 25. Qxh8: free rook+ attacking both bishops. and here black resigned. Any comments and/or advice is appreciated:)
